name: Clear Gmail - Dark Background [UPDATED]
description: Minimalist gmail style which makes the most of your preset background. This version is for those whose backgrounds contain dark colours. If you notice any bugs or have any requested features, feel free to comment and let me know! NOTE: The style does not automatically apply the background you see in the thumbnail. It works with whatever background you currently have set. If you want the thumbnail backgrounds, you can download them at the links below and install them the normal way within Gmail. Preview image sources: Thumbnail: https://wallup.net/mountain-sunset-night-stars-snow/ Secondary screenshot #1: https://wallpapercave.com/wp/wp6417740.png
additional_info:
Versions:
V2.0 - Updated to also work for Google's updated Gmail styling.
V1.1 - Changed checkbox for selected emails to improve visual clarity.
